name: Rebecca
text: On Play Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal 1 (Dressrosa) type card other than [Rebecca] and add it to your hand. Then trash the remaining cards.

effect.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal 1 (Dressrosa) type card other than [Rebecca] and add it to your hand. Then trash the remaining cards.

meta.notes: Rarity is printed as 'C' in the bottom right corner. The card is a sample, indicated by the watermark.
